title: Not Receiving Hextech Chest
body:
Hi,

I've recently played a game where I was queue'd up with my friend he got an S-, if i remember correctly, people that are duo'd with that person also get a hextech chest. But I didn't get one :/

Did it change?
P.S I haven't received a hextech chest for at least a month, I've got 3 full key but no chests :(

replies.body: Maybe you have already received a Hextech chest as that champion.
